title: BlizzCon 2023: The Best Cosplay From World Of Warcraft To Diablo 4
description:
Blizzard's annual BlizzCon event is known primarily for its showcase of the company's games, but it's also a major destination for cosplayers. BlizzCon 2023 was no exception, featuring a wide array of elaborate costumes based on Blizzard's games, including Overwatch 2, World of Warcraft, and Diablo 4.

Throughout the event, Blizzard announced three new expansions for World of Warcraft,

title: WoW Is Offering Paid Expansion Early Access For The First Time, And Fans Are Divided
description:
World of Warcraft's next expansion is The War Within, and for the first time ever, Blizzard will provide players who pay more with the ability to play the expansion early.

The standard version of The War Within, slated to arrive in Fall 2024, costs $50. A Heroic edition upgrade, which includes more Traders Tender currency to use in-game, a transmog set, and unique mount, is priced at $70. Shelling out $90 for the Epic edition includes everything from previous editions, but additionally includes a unique toy, pet, hearthstone effect, 30 days of game time, guaranteed beta access, and, most critically, three days of early access to the expansion.

It's that last bit that has divided players in the WoW community, many of whom aren't exactly

title: CoD: Modern Warfare 3 Details How MW2 Camos Work, Plus First Look At Beautiful Mastery Camos
description:
Unlocking camos is a big part of the Call of Duty grind, and a blog post details all the new camos you can work towards in Modern Warfare 3. This gives a first look at some beautiful new mastery camos, and it also provides more details about the camos that carry over from Modern Warfare 2. Here is everything you need to know about Modern Warfare 3's new camo grind.

How MW2 camos work in MW3

Just like past titles, Modern Warfare 3 has two categories for camos you can unlock. These include the standard base camos and the coveted "mastery" completionist camos. Additionally, all of the weapon camos from Modern Warfare 2 will carry over to Modern Warfare 3 as part of Call of Duty's new

title: Save Up To 50% On Asus Gaming Gear At Amazon
description: Dozens of Asus PC gaming peripherals are on sale at Amazon right now, with select items up to 50% off. While not technically part of an early Black Friday

title: PS5 Losing Twitter/X Support Soon, And Elon Musk Is Likely To Blame
description:
PlayStation has announced that it is dropping integration with X, the platform formerly known as Twitter, in the very near future. On November 13, any integration with X will no longer function across PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4, Sony has alerted users.

"This includes the ability to view any content published on X on PS5/PS4, and the ability to post and view content, trophies, and other gameplay-related activities on X directly from PS5/PS4 (or link an X account to do so)," PlayStation said.

There are other ways to share game captures on PS5 and PS4. PS5 users can use the PlayStation App, while PS4 owners can create and share content via the ShareFactory app. But this isn't ideal for people who were enjoying the

title: CoD: Modern Warfare 3 Has Day-One DLC That Supports Military Veterans
description:
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III officially launches on November 10, and the in-game store will have DLC available right away that helps support military veterans.

Activision has announced that there will be a new Call of Duty Endowment Warrior Pack available at launch. The company isn't revealing the full contents yet, but it will contain multiple weapon blueprints, an Operator, a vehicle skin, a charm, a calling card, an emblem, and a sticker. You can see the silhouettes for all the items in the image below.

title: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Campaign Review Roundup
description:
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III officially arrives on November 10, but the campaign has been playable since November 2 for those who preorder the digital version of the game. How's it going over with critics?

Reviews have begun to appear online, and the general consensus is that this year's campaign leaves a lot to be desired. Here at GameSpot, our Modern Warfare III review scored the game a 5/10, saying this year's campaign was the weakest since the 2019 Modern Warfare reboot.

"Modern Warfare 3 sparks a ho

title: Zack Snyder's Rebel Moon And Army Of The Dead Share A Story Universe
description:
Since departing the DC Universe, director Zack Snyder has brought his energy and focus back into original projects such as Army of the Dead and the upcoming Rebel Moon, both for Netflix. While it might seem that the two films have nothing in common aside from the filmmaker, they are actually part of a bigger shared universe.

Talking to Total Film, Snyder revealed that Rebel Moon--which started as a failed Star Wars pitch--shares ties with Army of the Dead, his post-apocalyptic, zombie-filled heist film, but not in the way you might think.

"Army of the Dead has a pretty vast mythology that never made it into the movie," Snyder explains, via GamesRadar. "There's actually a character from Rebel Moon in the Army of the Dead animated series that we never did."

title: CoD: Modern Warfare 3 Has A New Way To Unlock Attachments With Challenges
description:
As to be expected, a new Call of Duty game means a fresh grind for XP and weapon progression, and Modern Warfare 3 will offer a few ways to level up fast. A new Call of Duty blog post details all the challenges you can expect at launch, including new armory unlocks to help you unlock attachments faster. Here's everything you need to know about challenges and leveling up in Modern Warfare 3.

Daily, weekly, and career challenges

You'll have a few challenge types to help you progress through the ranks in Modern Warfare 3. These are split into dailies, weekly, and career challenges.

Daily challenges

Daily challenges give you a set of challenges to complete every 24 hours, and these are similar to what Call of Duty has of

title: Possible Nintendo Switch 2 Details Continue To Emerge
description:
Nintendo is widely expected to be working on a successor to the Switch. Although there has still yet to be any official word on the system, a new report has provided some insight into the custom processor that may power it

Back in June 2021, tech leaker kopite7kimi posted a picture of Nvidia's T234 processor, claiming that Nvidia was working on a custom variant called the T239 for Nintendo. In a new report, Digital Foundry stakes a claim the T239 is probably at the heart of the Switch 2. They base this assertion on a combination of leaks, LinkedIn posts, an Nvidia hack, and some "common sense reasoning." A key piece of evidence that the Switch 2 will use this processor is found within the aforementioned hack. According to the leaked information, Nvidia is using a NVN

title: Five Nights At Freddy's Movie Passes $200 Million Worldwide, Despite Second-Weekend Dropoff
description:
The Five Nights at Freddy's movie has now cleared more than $200 million at the box office against a reported budget of $20 million. According to the latest box office numbers from Variety, the FNAF film earned another $19.4 million in the US for its second weekend to help push global figures to more than $217 million.

Most movies experience double-digit percent declines in box office results after the first weekend, and the FNAF movie was no different. Its second-weekend domestic result of $19.4 million was down 76% from its record-breaking $80 million debut.

In any event, though, the FNAF movie has now eclipsed $113 million in the US alone. Also worth noting is that the FNAF movie debuted in theaters and on Peacock at the same time,

title: Diablo 4 Season 3 Adds Weekly Challenge Dungeons, A New Endgame Activity
description:
Diablo IV's Season 3 will add a new endgame activity in the form of a weekly challenge dungeon called The Gauntlet, which will see players competing to earn the top spots on the game's leaderboards for both fame and exclusive cosmetic rewards.

The mode sounds similar to Diablo III's Challenge Rifts, although players participating in The Gauntlet in Diablo IV Season 3 will be bringing their own characters and builds into the dungeon this time around. Each week, all players will compete by running the same "fixed seed linear dungeon" to earn high scores, with speed and efficiency being of the essence. The Gauntlet is on a timer, and killing enemies and completing the dungeon quickly will earn players points that contribute to their score. To encourage efficiency, loot will only drop at the end of The Gauntlet and not from defeated enemies along the way.

title: Max's Ad-Free Legacy Plan Drops 4K Support, Reduces Concurrent Stream Numbers
description:
While Warner Bros. Discovery warned ad-free subscribers about feature changes earlier this year, people were reportedly still surprised to see 4K support removed from their legacy plans. The Max ad-free plan only offers HD resolution and streaming on two concurrent devices--a downgrade from ultra HD and three, respectively, that these customers previously had from HBO Max accounts.

Variety notes WB began emailing legacy ad-free subscribers about the changes last week. This all stems from HBO Max becoming Max and how it affected memberships. The company stated that HBO Max customers would keep their plans and features for at least six months, which has now passed. Previously, the ad-free tier includ

title: Nintendo Reveals Official Black Friday 2023 Switch Deals, Including Smash Bros. Console Bundle
description:
Nintendo has announced its lineup of official Black Friday 2023 Switch deals. As usual, there are some tremendous deals on Nintendo Switch-exclusive games. Most of the price cuts won't actually take effect until November 19, so you've got plenty of time to put together a shopping list before cashing in on the price cuts.

The big surprise here is the new Nintendo Switch OLED bundle. This bundle comes with Super Smash Bros. Ultimate-themed Joy-Con controllers, a digital copy of the game, and a three-month Switch Online membership. Nintendo had already released its 2023 holiday bundle--a regular Switch with Mario Kart

title: Xbox Games To Be Made With AI Under New Deal
description:
Microsoft has announced that it has teamed up with AI company Inworld AI for a multi-year partnership to use its tools to develop Xbox Games.

Inworld AI will supposedly help with building game dialogue and narrative tools at scale in order to build out story and quest design. Not only will this partnership be utilized within Xbox game studios, but also third-party studios for new games.

Inworld AI CEO Ilya Gelfenbeyn mentioned that the use of AI could reduce the time and resource restraints during production, thus allowing games to ship faster. The company's design copilot would take input ideas and turn into the detailed scripts, dialogue trees, quests, and more.

title: Mayans MC Boss Rebooting Prison Break For Hulu - Report
description:
Fox's Prison Break ran for 90 episodes throughout 12 years with a movie and a nine-episode fifth season that acted more as a limited series and proper epilogue. Deadline is reporting that Hulu is in early development of a reboot of the drama series, that will not feature any of the original characters.

It is written and executive produced by Mayans M.C. co-creator, executive producer, and showrunner Elgin James with original series creator Paul Scheuring also executive producing. This reboot is described as a "new chapter", but is still set in the world of Prison Break according to Deadline's sources.

The original Prison Break follows two brothers--Lincoln Burrows, who has been sentenced to death for a crime he did not commit, and Michael Scofield, who hatches a plan to help Lincoln escape prison. The show was a huge hit and earned a Golden Globe for Best Television Series

title: Homer Will Stop Choking Bart on The Simpsons, He Says In Recent Episode
description:
The Simpsons, one of the longest-running and most iconic TV shows ever, is seemingly doing away with one of its most well-known recurring gags. On a recent episode of The Simpsons, Homer explains that he no longer chokes his son Bart because "times have changed."

As part of the Season 35 episode "McMansion & Wife," which debuted on October 22, Homer confirms that he no longer throttles Bart by wringing his neck with his hands. Homer meets a new neighbor, Thayer, and shakes hands. "Whoa! That's quite a grip," Thayer says to Homer. He replies, "See, Marge, strangling the boy has paid off. Just kidding. I don't do that any more. Times have changed."

The producers of The Simpsons have yet to officially comment on whether or not this is a permanent change for the show.

title: Stranger Things Prequel Play The First Shadow Gets Behind The Scenes Look
description:
A new featurette from Netflix sheds light on the upcoming Stranger Things prequel play, The First Shadow.

Debuting on the West End in London, The First Shadow is set in 1959 and follows young Henry Creel as he begins his life in Hawkins, leading up to his induction into the Hawkins Lab test program as 001. He strikes up a budding romance with new character Patty Newby, played by Ella Karuna Williams. Younger versions of Stranger Things regulars like Joyce, Hopper, and Bob fill out the supporting cast. The featurette showcases interviews with much of the cast and crew as well as rehearsal footage.

Stranger Things creators The Duffer Brothers introduce the featurette and express their enthusiasm for the project. Matt Duffer said, "The team behind The First Shadow, it's the ultimate, it's the dream team." Stephen Daldry, who directed the Billy Elliot film and its musical version among many other stage and film productions, co-directed the production w

title: Star Wars Force FX Lightsabers Get A Huge Discount In This Early Black Friday Amazon Deal
description:
Anyone who has watched a Star Wars film or TV show has dreamed about owning a lightsaber, and right now, you can get a big discount on this elegant weapon wielded by Jedi during more civilized times. As a bonus, you don't even have to worry about accidentally disarming yourself with one of these replicas, as Hasbro's official line of Black Series lightsabers sport all the visual and audio effects of those props without most of the risk attached to them. Please don't poke fellow Star Wars cosplayers in the eye with one of these.

  • Star Wars Black Series: Force FX Elite Luk

title: Buy 2, Get 1 Free Manga Box Sets - One Piece, My Hero Academia, Tokyo Ghoul, And More
description: Manga fans have a great opportunity to fill up their shelves this week, as Amazon has kicked off a new buy two, get one free promotion ahead of Black Friday 2023. This promotion will allow you to choose three eligible items from Amazon's list and get the cheapest product for free. You'll be able to mix and match across a wide selection of goods like video games and books, so you won't be limited to a single category either. Target is also hosting a similar B2G1 free sale, though Amazon's prices tend to be better on books. Oh, and make sure to check out our roundup of the b

title: World Of Warcraft On Console Might Have Some Renewed Hope
description:
World of Warcraft is one of the most popular games of all time, but the MMO has never made the jump to console like others have before it. Blizzard still has no announced plans to bring WoW to console, but a senior developer for WoW has now said Blizzard is "pretty well positioned" to do it.

WoW's vice president and executive producer, Holly Longdale, told GamesRadar that she doesn't necessarily agree that WoW has too many technical logistics and complexities to transition to console.

"Well, it depends on who you ask. I don't think it is, frankly. I think we're pretty well positioned, which is kind of why we talk about it," Longdale said. "It's a complicated question. For a console audience, the approachability is likely going to be different."

Conti

title: Amazon B2G1 Free Game Sale - Armored Core 6, Assassin's Creed Mirage, Sonic Superstars, And More
description:
For anyone looking to score a terrific bargain on some recently released video games, Amazon is now hosting one of its buy two, get one free mix-and-match sales ahead of Black Friday 2023. As the title suggest, you'll be able to purchase three games, with the cheapest one in your cart being free when you check out. So far, we're seeing some of the biggest games of the year appear in this promotion, and it's worth pointing out that this special is running across several categories that'll allow you to mix and match your choices across games, books, toys, and more categories.

Amazon B2G1 free sale

title: Super Mario Party Joy-Con Bundle Revealed For Black Friday
description:
The Black Friday 2023 shopping bonanza is upon us, and Nintendo is (of course) getting in on the action with a variety of offers. One of these is a new package that bundles together Super Mario Party with a red and blue Joy-Con bundle.

The bundle is set to retail for $100, which Nintendo says represents a savings of $40 if purchased separately. The Super Mario Party + Joy-Con bundle goes on sale November 10. The bundle includes a download code for Super Mario Party, not a cartridge, in case that matters to you.

Some are wondering why Nintendo opted to make 2018's Super Mario Party the focus of this bundle, as there is a newer Mario Party game, 2021's Mario Party Superstars also available.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Like A Dragon Gaiden Review - The Man Who Can't Escape The Yakuza
description:
Perhaps I was naive to think that the legend of Kazuma Kiryu actually wrapped up with Yakuza 6: The Song of Life, and that his appearance in Yakuza: Like A Dragon was simply a nod to longtime fans such as myself. Having played through Like A Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name, I'm now convinced that leaving Kiryu to grow old in the shadows wouldn't have been the right move. Although Gaiden is a bite-sized story--noticeably shorter than previous entries--it proves that there's still so much more to Kiryu's legacy.

From the wild new Agent fighting style to the wealth of captivating side activities and tried-and-true Yakuza story drama, Gaiden is a tight package that's akin to a 'greatest hits' for the franchise. While i

title: Like A Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name Review
description: RGG Studio's latest action-brawler is a captivating and emotional look at Kiryu's life that offers a 'greatest hits' of the series' gameplay.

title: Fortnite OG Breaks Its All-Time Player Records At Launch
description:
Epic Games dropped a blast from the past last week, as the month-long Fortnite OG season--which brings back the game's original island arena from 2018--kicked off on November 3. The decision has already proven wildly popular, as the company has reported all-time records for both unique user counts and the number of hours played in the first 24 hours of the new season.

Over 44.7 million users logged into Fortnite during the first day of Fortnite OG, which according to Epic marks the game's most popular single day in its five-year history. Those player accounted for a combined 102 million hours of playing time, which is another all-time record.

Circana industry analyst Mat Piscatella added some more impressive context to this feat on his

title: Marvel's Echo Is Coming To Disney Plus And Hulu, Here's The First Trailer
description:
For the first time ever, a MCU TV show will debut on Hulu as well as Disney+ with Echo. Not only that, but the five-episode series will debut with the entire season available to watch starting January 10 on both streaming services.

The official trailer for Echo also dropped--seen below--which focuses on the complicated relationship between Maya Lopez (portrayed by Alaqua Cox) and Wilson Fisk (played by Vincent D'Onofrio). Their connection was first explored in Hawkeye, as this is a spinoff-off of that series. In addition, the footage showcases a plethora of blood and violence, with this being the first Disney+ MCU show to get labeled with a TV-MA rating.

Along with Cox and D'Onofrio, the Echo cast includes Chaske Spencer (The English), Graham Greene (1883), Tantoo Cardinal (Killers of the Flower Moo

title: Ark: Survival Ascended Console Release Date Revealed, Cross-Play Confirmed
description:
The Ark: Survival Evolved remake, Survival Ascended, is coming to console soon and there will be cross-play support at launch. In a blog post, developer Studio Wildcard said the Xbox edition will launch on November 14 and it will be up-to-date with the PC edition, which released at the end of October.

In addition to cross-play support between Xbox and PC, there will be brand-new servers, including Xbox-specific servers. The PlayStation edition is currently being finalized, Studio Wildcard said, and it's projected to release at the end of November. Studio Wildcard said the PlayStation version, whenever it's ready, will have cross-play support between PC and Xbox at launch. There will be PlayStation-specific servers, too, so players can opt to only play inside their own platform.

Previously, the console editions of Survival As

title: Best Books In Amazon's B2G1 Free Sale - Graphic Novels, Box Sets, Gaming Books, And More
description:
If your nightstand is no longer cluttered with books, then it's time to consider adding some new ones to the pile during Amazon's buy two, get one free sale. Like previous B2G1 sales event, Amazon's latest pre-Black Friday 2023 promotion includes thousands of items. You can mix-and-match across categories, including video games, toys, and more--the cheapest item in your cart will be marked down to zero dollars. Target is also hosting a buy two, get one free sale of its own, but keep in mind that books in particular tend to cost less at Amazon.

If you can't find three books you want, remember that you can mix-and-match. There are plenty of e
